desc: With an attention to health and safety and well being of VIP's everywhere, VIP Supply is focused on servicing its customers directly with integrity, pride and dedication to what we do.

layout.text:
INSPIRE CONFIDENCE
in your COVID Task Force
& prevent SARS-Cov-2 spread
with Zero-Out-of-Pocket-Cost
PCR Testing

US Schools & Businesses can qualify for no-out-of-pocket-cost, bulk testing programs (nasal swab or saliva cup specimen vials) including two-way prepaid shipping, and offering expedited processing from receipt of sample with compliance in all 50 states.
